channel.title: Where Should I put this? (Trying to Make an item do something on an object)

item.title: Where Should I put this? (Trying to Make an item do something on an object)
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

else if(useItemID == 1779 && atObjectID == 2644) { //spinning flax setAnimation(862); deleteItem(1779, getItemSlot(1779), 1); addItem(1777, 1); addSkillXP(1000, 10); }

That should work fine.

Read full topic
